channel.title: politics on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in politics on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Amy Klobuchar 2020 Presidential Campaign Logo
The 2020 Presidential Campaign of Amy Klobuchar, the senior United States senator from Minnesota and former Hennepin County attorney, was formally announced on February 10, 2019 in Minneapolis. Prior to her announcement, Klobuchar had been discussed as a potential candidate for the office by multiple news publications. Source
You can download theAmy Klobucharlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Amy Klobuchar
item.description: The 2020 Presidential Campaign of Amy Klobuchar, the senior United States senator from Minnesota and former Hennepin County attorney, was formally announced on February 10, 2019 in Minneapolis. Prior to her announcement, Klobuchar had been discussed as a potential candidate for the office by multiple news publications. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Andrew Yang 2020 Presidential Campaign Logo
The 2020 Presidential Campaign of Andrew Yang, an attorney, entrepreneur, and the founder of Venture for America, began on November 6, 2017, when Yang filed with the Federal Election Commission to participate in the Democratic primaries. Yang suspended his campaign on February 11, 2020, the night of the New Hampshire primary. Source
You can download theAndrew Yanglogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Andrew Yang
item.description: The 2020 Presidential Campaign of Andrew Yang, an attorney, entrepreneur, and the founder of Venture for America, began on November 6, 2017, when Yang filed with the Federal Election Commission to participate in the Democratic primaries. Yang suspended his campaign on February 11, 2020, the night of the New Hampshire primary. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Biden Harris 2020 Presidential Campaign Logo
The 2020 Presidential Campaign of Joe Biden began on April 25, 2019, when Biden released a video announcing his candidacy in the 2020 Democratic party presidential primaries, and concluded with him and his running mate Kamala Harris defeating incumbent president Donald Trump in the general election. Source
You can download theBiden Harrislogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Biden Harris
item.description: The 2020 Presidential Campaign of Joe Biden began on April 25, 2019, when Biden released a video announcing his candidacy in the 2020 Democratic party presidential primaries, and concluded with him and his running mate Kamala Harris defeating incumbent president Donald Trump in the general election. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Bill Weld 2020 Presidential Campaign Logo
On February 15, 2019, former Massachusetts Governor Bill Weld announced the formation of an exploratory committee to consider running for the Republican nomination in the 2020 United States presidential election. On April 15, 2019 Weld officially announced he would be running for president, challenging incumbent Donald Trump. Source
You can download theBill Weldlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Bill Weld
item.description: On February 15, 2019, former Massachusetts Governor Bill Weld announced the formation of an exploratory committee to consider running for the Republican nomination in the 2020 United States presidential election. On April 15, 2019 Weld officially announced he would be running for president, challenging incumbent Donald Trump. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Raised Black Fist Logo
The raised fist, or the clenched fist, is a universal symbol of solidarity and support. It is also used as a salute to express unity, strength, or resistance. Source The Black Power movement was a social movement motivated by a desire for safety and self-sufficiency that was not available inside redlined African American neighborhoods, Black Power activists founded Black-owned bookstores, food cooperatives, farms, media, printing presses, schools, clinics and ambulance services.
You can download theBlack Fistlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Black Fist
item.description: The raised fist, or the clenched fist, is a universal symbol of solidarity and support. It is also used as a salute to express unity, strength, or resistance. Source The Black Power movement was a social movement motivated by a desire for safety and self-sufficiency that was not available inside redlined African American neighborhoods, Black Power activists founded Black-owned bookstores, food cooperatives, farms, media, printing presses, schools, clinics and ambulance services.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Black Lives Matter (BLM) Logo
Black Lives Matter is a decentralized political and social movement protesting against incidents of police brutality and all racially motivated violence against black people. While there are specific organizations like the Black Lives Matter Global Network that label themselves simply as “Black Lives Matter”, the Black Lives Matter movement comprises a broad array of people and organizations. Source
You can download theBLMlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: BLM
item.description: Black Lives Matter is a decentralized political and social movement protesting against incidents of police brutality and all racially motivated violence against black people. While there are specific organizations like the Black Lives Matter Global Network that label themselves simply as “Black Lives Matter”, the Black Lives Matter movement comprises a broad array of people and organizations. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Cory Booker 2020 Presidential Campaign Logo
The 2020 Presidential Campaign of U.S. Senator Cory Booker was announced on February 1, 2019, when a video titled “We Will Rise” was posted on Booker’s YouTube channel. He intentionally chose the first day of Black History Month to announce his candidacy. Booker suspended his campaign on January 13, 2020. Source
You can download theCory Bookerlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Cory Booker
item.description: The 2020 Presidential Campaign of U.S. Senator Cory Booker was announced on February 1, 2019, when a video titled “We Will Rise” was posted on Booker’s YouTube channel. He intentionally chose the first day of Black History Month to announce his candidacy. Booker suspended his campaign on January 13, 2020. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Democratic Party Logo
The Democratic Party is one of the two major contemporary political parties in the United States, along with its main, historic rival, the Republican Party. Tracing its heritage to Thomas Jefferson and James Madison’s Democratic-Republican Party, the modern-day Democratic Party was founded around 1828 by supporters of Andrew Jackson, making it the world’s oldest active political party. Source
You can download theDemocratic Partylogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Democratic Party
item.description: The Democratic Party is one of the two major contemporary political parties in the United States, along with its main, historic rival, the Republican Party. Tracing its heritage to Thomas Jefferson and James Madison’s Democratic-Republican Party, the modern-day Democratic Party was founded around 1828 by supporters of Andrew Jackson, making it the world’s oldest active political party. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Democratic National Convention (DNC) 2020 Logo
The 2020 Democratic National Convention was a presidential nominating convention that was held from August 17 to 20, 2020, at the Wisconsin Center in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, and virtually across the United States. Source
You can download theDNC 2020logo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: DNC 2020
item.description: The 2020 Democratic National Convention was a presidential nominating convention that was held from August 17 to 20, 2020, at the Wisconsin Center in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, and virtually across the United States. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Elizabeth Warren 2020 Presidential Campaign Logo
The 2020 Presidential Campaign of Elizabeth Warren, was a campaign from senior United States senator from Massachusetts. It began with Warren’s formal announcement on February 9, 2019, at a rally in Lawrence, Massachusetts, at the site of the 1912 Bread and Roses Strike. Source
You can download theElizabeth Warrenlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Elizabeth Warren
item.description: The 2020 Presidential Campaign of Elizabeth Warren, was a campaign from senior United States senator from Massachusetts. It began with Warren’s formal announcement on February 9, 2019, at a rally in Lawrence, Massachusetts, at the site of the 1912 Bread and Roses Strike. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Joe Biden 2020 Presidential Campaign Logo On March 12, 2019, he told a gathering of his supporters he may need their energy “in a few weeks”. Five days later, Biden accidentally revealed that he would be a candidate at a dinner in Dover, Delaware. On April 19, 2019, The Atlantic reported that Biden planned to officially announce his campaign five days later via a video announcement, followed by a launch rally in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, or Charlottesville, Virginia.
You can download theJoe Bidenlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Joe Biden
item.description: On March 12, 2019, he told a gathering of his supporters he may need their energy “in a few weeks”. Five days later, Biden accidentally revealed that he would be a candidate at a dinner in Dover, Delaware. On April 19, 2019, The Atlantic reported that Biden planned to officially announce his campaign five days later via a video announcement, followed by a launch rally in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, or Charlottesville, Virginia.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Kamala Harris 2020 Presidential Campaign Logo
The 2020 Presidential Campaign of Kamala Harris, the junior United States senator from California, officially began on January 21, 2019, with an announcement on Good Morning America. Harris had widely been considered a “high profile” candidate for the 2020 Democratic Party presidential primaries since 2016. Source
You can download theKamala Harrislogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Kamala Harris
item.description: The 2020 Presidential Campaign of Kamala Harris, the junior United States senator from California, officially began on January 21, 2019, with an announcement on Good Morning America. Harris had widely been considered a “high profile” candidate for the 2020 Democratic Party presidential primaries since 2016. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Marianne Williamson 2020 Presidential Campaign Logo
The 2020 Presidential Campaign of Marianne Williamson, an author, activist, and spiritual leader, was announced on January 28, 2019, after the initial formation of an exploratory committee on November 15, 2018. Source
You can download theMarianne Williamsonlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Marianne Williamson
item.description: The 2020 Presidential Campaign of Marianne Williamson, an author, activist, and spiritual leader, was announced on January 28, 2019, after the initial formation of an exploratory committee on November 15, 2018. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Mike Bloomberg 2020 Presidential Campaign Logo
The 2020 Presidential Campaign of Michael Bloomberg, a businessman and former mayor of New York City, began when he filed a statement of candidacy with the Federal Election Commission for the office of President of the United States as a member of the Democratic Party on November 21, 2019. Source
You can download theMike Bloomberglogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Mike Bloomberg
item.description: The 2020 Presidential Campaign of Michael Bloomberg, a businessman and former mayor of New York City, began when he filed a statement of candidacy with the Federal Election Commission for the office of President of the United States as a member of the Democratic Party on November 21, 2019. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Pete Buttigieg 2020 Presidential Campaign Logo
The 2020 Presidential Campaign of Pete Buttigieg was an election campaign for the former mayor of South Bend, Indiana. It was formally announced on April 14, 2019, in South Bend. Buttigieg was the first openly gay candidate to seek the Democratic nomination for president. Source
You can download thePete Buttigieglogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Pete Buttigieg
item.description: The 2020 Presidential Campaign of Pete Buttigieg was an election campaign for the former mayor of South Bend, Indiana. It was formally announced on April 14, 2019, in South Bend. Buttigieg was the first openly gay candidate to seek the Democratic nomination for president. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Republican Party (GOP) Logo
The Republican Party, also referred to as the GOP (Good Old Party), is one of the two major contemporary political parties in the United States, along with its main, historic rival, the Democratic Party. The GOP was founded in 1854 by opponents of the Kansas–Nebraska Act, which allowed for the potential expansion of slavery into the western territories. Source
You can download theRepublican Partylogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Republican Party
item.description: The Republican Party, also referred to as the GOP (Good Old Party), is one of the two major contemporary political parties in the United States, along with its main, historic rival, the Democratic Party. The GOP was founded in 1854 by opponents of the Kansas–Nebraska Act, which allowed for the potential expansion of slavery into the western territories. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Trump Pence 2020 Presidential Campaign Logo
The 2020 Donald Trump presidential campaign was a re-election campaign for the 2020 United States presidential election by President of the United States Donald Trump, who took office on January 20, 2017. Donald Trump began his reelection campaign unusually early for an incumbent president. Source
You can download theTrump Pencelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Trump Pence
item.description: The 2020 Donald Trump presidential campaign was a re-election campaign for the 2020 United States presidential election by President of the United States Donald Trump, who took office on January 20, 2017. Donald Trump began his reelection campaign unusually early for an incumbent president. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Tulsi Gabbard 2020 Presidential Campaign Logo
The 2020 Presidential Campaign of Tulsi Gabbard, the U.S. Representative for Hawaii’s 2nd congressional district, began on January 11, 2019. In January 2020, she was polling at about 1 to 2 percent. Had she won, she would have become the first female, Hindu, and Samoan president in American history, and the youngest person to ever hold the office. Source
You can download theTulsi Gabbardlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Tulsi Gabbard
item.description: The 2020 Presidential Campaign of Tulsi Gabbard, the U.S. Representative for Hawaii’s 2nd congressional district, began on January 11, 2019. In January 2020, she was polling at about 1 to 2 percent. Had she won, she would have become the first female, Hindu, and Samoan president in American history, and the youngest person to ever hold the office. Source
